title: Does svelte-kit support PUT and DELETE http methods in the html forms?

data.msg: I know html forms only supports POST and GET methods in <form> tags. but does svelte/svelte-kit support it?

Hey @Unorthodox. As you say forms only support POST and GET requests, and SK follows that convention. You could try the PUT as a fun experiment, but I wouldn't do that in a real application as it's not defined behavior. If it by chance does work it might stop working in later versions.
yeah it didn't work, I tried using PUT but apparently it ends up as a GET request, I just used post method instead. Thanks for the answer
